file_intent: Centralized application configuration and environment-aware defaults

responsibility_blocks.description: Loads environment, sets environment-based defaults and exposes core config constants (ENV, LOG_LEVEL, LOG_FORMAT, SESSION_TTL_SECONDS, MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE_MB)
responsibility_blocks.label: Environment and general configuration

responsibility_blocks.description: Defines default connection parameters for the PostgreSQL database with host, port, name, user, password and pooling settings
responsibility_blocks.label: Database configuration

responsibility_blocks.description: Defines default Redis connection parameters (host, port, db)
responsibility_blocks.label: Redis configuration

responsibility_blocks.description: Specifies allowed origins for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing
responsibility_blocks.label: CORS configuration

responsibility_blocks.description: Maintains a whitelist of file extensions considered as supported for uploads/processes
responsibility_blocks.label: Supported file types
